AvengingTruth.name: Avenging Truth
AvengingTruth.description: Blocking absorbs 20% of incoming damage, stored as Extra Damage for the next charge attack.,+0.3 'Truth'

Berserker.name: Berserker
Berserker.description: +5% Attack Speed (Max: 75%) for 4s on Critical Hit

BleedingWillow.name: Bleeding Willow
BleedingWillow.description: A blend of strong and rapid strikes with leaping combos.

BlindJustice.name: Blind Justice
BlindJustice.description: Reverse grip style emphasizing slashing and impaling strikes.

BloodRush.name: Blood Rush
BloodRush.description: +15% Critical Chance stacks with Combo Multiplier

CarvingMantis.name: Carving Mantis
CarvingMantis.description: Strong slashes and quick stabs that keeps momentum forward.

CoilingViper.name: Coiling Viper
CoilingViper.description: Powerful arcing strikes with energetic flips.

ConditionOverload.name: Condition Overload
ConditionOverload.description: +10% Melee Damage per Status Type affecting the target.

CovertLethality.name: Covert Lethality
CovertLethality.description: +25 Extra Damage on Melee Attacks, or Lethal Damage on Finishers.

CrossingSnakes.name: Crossing Snakes
CrossingSnakes.description: Multi-angle strikes and deadly thrust attacks.

CrushingRuin.name: Crushing Ruin
CrushingRuin.description: Aerial attacks with crowd control combos.

DispatchOverdrive.name: Dispatch Overdrive
DispatchOverdrive.description: On Melee Channel Kill:+10% Movement Speed for 2.5s

ElectromagneticShielding.name: Electromagnetic Shielding
ElectromagneticShielding.description: While blocking, redirect 25% of damage taken by allies within 2m to yourself.

EleventhStorm.name: Eleventh Storm
EleventhStorm.description: Rapid attacks using sword and shield.

EnergyChannel.name: Energy Channel
EnergyChannel.description: Converts 50% of Energy used to up to 50 Bonus Damage on next Melee Attack.

EntropyDetonation.name: Entropy Detonation
EntropyDetonation.description: Lethal ground attacks cause enemies to explode dealing +250,(+5% Enemy Max Health) <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage,in a +2.5m radius.,+0.3 'Entropy'

FracturingWind.name: Fracturing Wind
FracturingWind.description: Fast, multi-hit strikes with powerful finishers.

GeminiCross.name: Gemini Cross
GeminiCross.description: A style exhibiting sweeping slash attacks and swift jabs.

GrimFury.name: Grim Fury
GrimFury.description: Lightning fast hit chains and hard-hitting combos.

GuardianDerision.name: Guardian Derision
GuardianDerision.description: Blocking taunts enemies within 6 meters to target you instead of allies.

HealingReturn.name: Healing Return
HealingReturn.description: Restores 1 Health per Status Type affecting the target.

HighNoon.name: High Noon
HighNoon.description: Bullets spray between wicked slash attacks.

Hunter'SBonesaw.name: Hunter'S Bonesaw
Hunter'SBonesaw.description: Increase Damage by 15% and Status Chance by 10% when attacking a prone enemy.

IronPhoenix.name: Iron Phoenix
IronPhoenix.description: Fast cutting attacks with puncture finish.

MaimingStrike.name: Maiming Strike
MaimingStrike.description: +15% Critical Hit Chance for Slide Attack

ReapingSpiral.name: Reaping Spiral
ReapingSpiral.description: Far flung attacks and multi-hit combos.

RelentlessCombination.name: Relentless Combination
RelentlessCombination.description: +25% chance to increas﻿e Mele﻿e Combo Counter when <DT_SLASH>Slash Status deals damage.

RendingCrane.name: Rending Crane
RendingCrane.description: Downward cuts with an impact combo.

RiftStrike.name: Rift Strike
RiftStrike.description: Charge attacks now step through the rift to attack enemies up to 5m away

ShatteringStorm.name: Shattering Storm
ShatteringStorm.description: Methodical strikes and high impact combos.

ShimmeringBlight.name: Shimmering Blight
ShimmeringBlight.description: Fast spinning attacks and staggering strikes.

SinkingTalon.name: Sinking Talon
SinkingTalon.description: Strong, focused attacks with multi-hit spins.

SlicingFeathers.name: Slicing Feathers
SlicingFeathers.description: Twirling, acrobatic slashes with a refined touch.

SovereignOutcast.name: Sovereign Outcast
SovereignOutcast.description: An outlandish style with sweeping attacks.

SpringLoadedBlade.name: Spring-Loaded Blade
SpringLoadedBlade.description: +5% Weapon Range for 4s on Status Effect.

StaticDischarge.name: Static Discharge
StaticDischarge.description: Charge Attacks electrify nearby enemies for <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage equal to 30% of weapon damage.

StrainInfection.name: Strain Infection
StrainInfection.description: Melee Attacks gain +5% Critical Damage per Cyst.

SunderingWeave.name: Sundering Weave
SunderingWeave.description: Steady chopping strikes with focused damage.

TekGravity.name: Tek Gravity
TekGravity.description: Slam Attacks in the Marked Zone pull all enemies within 6m.

TwirlingSpire.name: Twirling Spire
TwirlingSpire.description: A mix of sweeping attacks with precise strikes.

VulcanBlitz.name: Vulcan Blitz
VulcanBlitz.description: Enemies explode on death, dealing 50 <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage (+10% Enemy Max Health) in a 1m radius.
